name: api_rendering_SpriteRenderer
description: A component that renders a Sprite.If a GameObject has a SpriteRenderer component, the component renders the assigned Sprite asset on the screen using the position, rotation and scale from the Transform component.You can use this to draw characters, items, backgrounds, and other visual elements in a 2D game.

properties.name: adaptiveModeThreshold
properties.description: The current threshold for Sprite Renderer tiling.

properties.name: color
properties.description: Rendering color for the Sprite graphic.

properties.name: drawMode
properties.description: The current draw mode of the Sprite Renderer.

properties.name: flipX
properties.description: Flips the sprite on the X axis.

properties.name: flipY
properties.description: Flips the sprite on the Y axis.

properties.name: maskInteraction
properties.description: Specifies how the sprite interacts with the masks.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Property to set or get the size to render when the SpriteRenderer.drawMode is set to SpriteDrawMode.Sliced or SpriteDrawMode.Tiled.

properties.name: sprite
properties.description: The Sprite to render.

properties.name: spriteSortPoint
properties.description: Determines the position of the Sprite used for sorting the SpriteRenderer.

properties.name: tileMode
properties.description: The current tile mode of the Sprite Renderer.

properties.name: RegisterSpriteChangeCallback
properties.description: Registers a callback to receive a notification when the SpriteRenderer's Sprite reference changes.

properties.name: UnregisterSpriteChangeCallback
properties.description: Removes a callback (that receives a notification when the Sprite reference changes) that was previously registered to a SpriteRenderer.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DestroyImmediate
properties.description: Destroys the specified object immediately. Use with caution and in Edit mode only.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.name: FindAnyObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindFirstObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves the first active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindObjectsByType
properties.description: Retrieves a list of all loaded objects of Type type.

properties.name: Instantiate
properties.description: Clones the object original and returns the clone.

properties.name: InstantiateAsync
properties.description: Captures a snapshot of the original object (that must be related to some GameObject) and returns the AsyncInstantiateOperation.
